title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website to showcase projects, skills, and experience.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A fully functional e-commerce platform with product management, shopping cart, and payment gateway integration.

title: Task Manager App
description: A task management application that allows users to create, update, and delete tasks with real-time notifications.

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: A dashboard that connects to multiple social media platforms to track followers, likes, and engagement metrics.

title: Blog Platform
description: A full-stack blog platform that allows users to create, edit, and publish blog posts with user authentication.

title: Restaurant Reservation System
description: A web app for managing restaurant reservations with real-time seat availability and customer notifications.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard that pulls data from a weather API to display current conditions and forecasts for different cities.

title: Online Learning Platform
description: A platform for hosting online courses with features for course enrollment, progress tracking, and video lectures.

title: Real Estate Listings
description: A real estate website for displaying property listings with search filters and map integration.

title: Job Board Platform
description: A platform where users can search for jobs, apply for positions, and companies can post job listings.
